meanings.definition: To furnish again; renovate or redecorate.
meanings.sent1: The family refurnished their living room with new sofas and tables.
meanings.sent2: After many years, they decided to refurnish their old house to make it look new again.
meanings.sent3: The decorator accidentally refurnished the wrong room, creating a mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Her smile refurnished the gloomy atmosphere in the room, bringing joy to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The artist refurnished the blank canvas with vibrant colors, turning it into a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To provide with new or different furniture.
meanings.sent1: The hotel refurnished all its rooms with modern beds and chairs.
meanings.sent2: She decided to refurnish her bedroom with a new wardrobe and a cozy armchair.
meanings.sent3: The office manager refurnished the meeting room with stylish furniture, impressing the clients.
meanings.sent4: His words refurnished her heart with love and warmth, making her feel cherished.
meanings.sent5: The interior designer refurnished the entire house with elegant pieces, transforming it into a luxurious space.
